item.title: Infinite scroll in React with a side of Copilot
item.description: I recently gave myself a little challenge to build an implementation of a generic Infinite Scrolling component or set of hooks with React and Typescript. Eventually I plan on creating my own components library that I can inject into any of my React projects. This component and some of the utilities would be part of that package. That project is for another day as this was more of an exercise to keep my React muscle-memory fresh while I continue to work on backend problems for my main project.
